machine_chiller

Contains logic pertaining to SMC Chillers

Functions
StartRunning
machine_chiller.StartRunning();

Enable the chiller

StopRunning
machine_chiller.StopRunning();

Sets the chiller to "Off"

IsRunning
machine_chiller.IsRunning(
&boolRunning
);

Returns whether the chiller is currently running.

Response Parameters
&boolRunning

is it running
